summary: User inquires about the availability of activity_task_schedule_to_start_latency metrics in the PHP SDK, expecting it to be present since the PHP SDK is built on top of the Go SDK which implements these metrics.
userImpact: Users cannot monitor activity scheduling latency metrics in PHP SDK, limiting observability into workflow performance.
resolutionDetails: Issue was closed due to inactivity by maintainer after clarification question was asked.
keyQuote: I can't activity_task_schedule_to_start_latency metrics on php-sdk. Is it not implemented yet?
